item.title: file xx has a name conflict over xx
item.description: 最近在编译使用proto时，遇到报错，错误如下 panic: proto: file "bytedance.proto" has a name conflict over OAID previously from: "xxx/baidu" currently from: "xxx/bytedance" See <https://protobuf.dev/reference/go/faq#namespace-conflict> 截图如下 从报错中，图中错误解决连接，访问，官网给出两种解决方案，分别如下： 1.方案一：编译器修改： 编译代码时指定 -ldflags “-X google.golang.org/protobuf/reflect/protoregistry.conflictPolicy=warn” 2.方案二：运行时指定 GOLANG_PROTOBUF_REGISTRATION_CONFLICT=warn 即可
